EmailTemplate.name: EM-202305-HP-GOVT-DGN.Email #1 (Expanding access through virtual primary care)
EmailTemplate.subject: Expanding access through virtual primary care
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Moving from challenge to opportunity With the restart of Medicaid redetermination, health plans are looking for ways to expand access to care as members shift to other forms of coverage. Our executive summary covers the challenges and opportunities that come with the end of continuous eligibility and how: • Medicaid redetermination affects everyone—from health plans to members • Virtual primary care eases care coverage transitions and expands access to care • A virtual care model offers higher quality care with lower costs for health plans About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
